titles.title: Commending public servants and members of the uniformed services for their dedication and continued service to the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 5/2/2002--Introduced. Declares that the House of Representatives: (1) encourages efforts to promote public service careers at all levels of government; (2) commends government employees and members of the uniformed services; (3) salutes government employees for their dedication and spirit for public service; and (4) honors public servants and service members who gave their lives in service to our country.
